page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT(CONT.)
page.content: The local shops, which include 2 supermarkets,chemist,newsagents,garage ,hairdresser,pet shop & chinese take- away provide for everyday needs. Services are also provided by a building society,post office & 2 banks .The Tesco Superstore which opened 2 years ago on the Oak Tree Lane development provided employment for 350.Ransom hospital for mentally ill patients provides 87 jobs including nursing along with 33 ancilliary staff On this site a further 60 jobs are part of the central Nottinghamshire Health Authority Head Quarters.The local schools provide further employment.Many local people work in Mansfield,the Ashfield Disricts & Nottingham.In May 1985 16% of males & 11.3% of females were unemployed.
